TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit FontInfo extends System.Object

span.span: Encapsulates the font properties of text.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 类封装文本的字体属性。Use the class to encapsulate the font properties of text. 可以指定字体名称和字体大小。You can specify the font name and font size. 还可以指定字体样式为粗体、斜体、带上划线、删除线或下划线。You can also specify whether the style of the font is bold, italic, overlined, strikethrough, or underlined. 此类通常用于需要字体信息（如类的属性）的类的属性中 。This class is commonly used in a property for a class that requires font information, such as the property of the class. > [!NOTE] > 此类没有公共构造函数。This class does not have a public constructor. 不能直接创建类的新实例。A new instance of the class cannot be created directly. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以 编程方式修改对象的属性，以指定控件的字体属性 。The following code example demonstrates how to modify the properties of a object programmatically to specify the font properties for a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[FontInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FontInfo/CS/fontinfocs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FontInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FontInfo/VB/fontinfovb.aspx#1)]

member this.Bold : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示字体是否为粗体。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the font is bold.

value.span: 如果字体为粗体，则为 ；否则，为 。

span.span: if the font is bold; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性来指定或确定字体是否为粗体。Use the property to specify or determine whether the font is bold. 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性以编程方式指定控件中文本的字体 。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically specify a bold font for the text in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[FontInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FontInfo/CS/fontinfocs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FontInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FontInfo/VB/fontinfovb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 将所有 属性重置为未设置状态并清除视图状态。

span.span: Resets all properties to the unset state and clears the view state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当创建对象时，属性将设置为未设置 。 properties are unset when the object is created. 第一次设置属性时，值将添加到视图状态。When a property is first set, the value is added to view state. 方法用于将所有 属性设置为 "未设置" 状态，并删除视图状态中的任何条目。The method is used to set all the properties to the unset state and remove any entries in view state. 以下属性将重置：The following properties are reset: - - - - - - - -

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void CopyFrom(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo f) cil managed

span.span: A that contains the font properties to duplicate.

summary.span: 将指定的 的字体属性复制到调用该方法的 类的实例中。

span.span: Duplicates the font properties of the specified into the instance of the class that this method is called from.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法将指定的的字体属性复制 到 从中调用此方法的类的实例。Use the method to duplicate the font properties of the specified into the instance of the class that this method is called from. > [!CAUTION] > 类的当前实例中的所有属性 都将替换为参数中的关联属性 `f` 。All properties in the current instance of the class will be replaced by the associated property in the `f` parameter. 当使用注册某个样式 ，然后使用复制该样式时， 只会将该 属性复制到目标，而不是所有的单个属性。When a style is registered using , and then copied using , only the property is copied to the destination, not all the individual properties. 因此，如果使用从已 注册的的属性复制字体信息 ，则不会从样式中获取字体的各个设置。Therefore, if you are using to copy font information from the property of a that is registered, you will not get the individual settings of the font from the style. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法将的 字体属性复制 到 控件的属性中 。The following example demonstrates how to use the method to duplicate the font properties of a into the property of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[FontInfoCopyFrom#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FontInfoCopyFrom/CS/fontinfocopycs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FontInfoCopyFrom#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FontInfoCopyFrom/VB/fontinfocopyvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void MergeWith(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo f) cil managed

param.name: f
param.span: 一个包含要结合的字体属性的 。

span.span: A that contains the font properties to combine.

summary.span: 将指定的 的字体属性与从中调用此方法的 类的实例相结合。

span.span: Combines the font properties of the specified with the instance of the class that this method is called from.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法可将指定的的字体属性 与 从中调用此方法的类的实例组合在一起。Use the method to combine the font properties of the specified with the instance of the class that this method is called from. > [!NOTE] > 此方法 通过将未在类的当前实例中设置的每个属性 与参数的相应属性中的值进行设置来联接两个对象的属性 `f` 。This method joins the properties of the two objects by setting each property that is not set in the current instance of the class with the value in the corresponding property of the `f` parameter. 仅替换尚未设置的属性。Only properties that have not been set will be replaced. 如果 `f` 未设置参数中的属性，则不会替换类的当前实例中的相应属性 。If a property in the `f` parameter is not set, it will not replace the corresponding property in the current instance of the class. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法将 的字体属性组合 到 控件的属性中 。The following example demonstrates how to use the method to combine the font properties of a into the property of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[FontInfoCopyFrom#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FontInfoCopyFrom/CS/fontinfocopycs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FontInfoCopyFrom#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FontInfoCopyFrom/VB/fontinfocopyvb.aspx#1)]

member this.Name : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置主要字体名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the primary font name.
The primary font name.

value.span: 默认值为 ，表示未设置此属性。

span.span: The default value is , which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定或确定主要字体名称。Use the property to specify or determine the primary font name. 主要字体名称确定用于显示与关联的控件中的文本的字体 。The primary font name determines the font that is used to display text in the control associated with the . > [!NOTE] > 设置属性时，属性会 自动更新为属性中的第一项 。When you set the property, the property is automatically updated with the first item in the property. 如果设置了 属性，则 会使用包含属性值的单个元素数组自动更新属性 。If you set the property, the property is automatically updated with a single element array containing the value of the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性以编程方式为控件指定字体名称 。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically specify the font name for a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[FontInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FontInfo/CS/fontinfocs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FontInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FontInfo/VB/fontinfovb.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 指定的字体名称为 null。

span.span: The specified font name is null.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property cli::array <System::String ^> ^ Names { cli::array <System::String ^> ^ get(); void set(cli::array <System::String ^> ^ value); };
member this.Names : string[] with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置字体名称的排序数组。

span.span: Gets or sets an ordered array of font names.
An ordered array of font names.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性来指定或确定的字体名称的有序数组 。Use the property to specify or determine an ordered array of font names for a . 属性通常用于存储可用字体名称的列表。The property is commonly used to store a list of available font names. > [!NOTE] > 设置属性时，属性会 自动更新为属性中的第一项 。When you set the property, the property is automatically updated with the first item in the property. 如果设置了 属性，则 会使用包含属性值的单个元素数组自动更新属性 。If you set the property, the property is automatically updated with a single element array containing the value of the property. 若要使用数组指定的字体名称 ，请将数组中的第一个元素设置为要使用的字体名称。To specify the font name for the using the array, set the first element in the array to the font name you want to use. 因为 当设置属性时，属性会自动更新 ，所以需要对 数组进行操作以重新排列数组中项的顺序，而不是直接设置 属性。Since the property is automatically updated when the property is set, you need to manipulate the array to rearrange the order of the items in the array instead of setting the property directly. 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in view state.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示字体是否带上划线。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the font is overlined.

value.span: 如果字体带上划线，则为 ；否则，为 。

span.span: if the font is overlined; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性来指定或确定字体是否在文本上方包含一条线。Use the property to specify or determine whether the font contains a line above the text. 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in view state. > [!NOTE] > 通过设置控件的的属性，对、和控件生成的链接的字体下划线行为进行了影响 。The font underline behavior for links generated by the , , and controls is affected by setting the property of the for the control. 如果 设置了属性，无论其值值如何，都必须显式设置此 属性（如果想要对该链接进行下划线）。If the property is set, regardless of value its value, you must set the property explicitly if you want the link to be underlined. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性以编程方式为控件中的文本指定带上划线字体 。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically specify an overlined font for the text in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[FontInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FontInfo/CS/fontinfocs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FontInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FontInfo/VB/fontinfovb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法可确定 属性是否已从其默认值更改。Use the method to determine whether the property has changed from its default value. 如果要为类创建设计器 或创建包含类的自己的控件，则通常使用此方法 。This method is commonly used if you are either creating a designer for the class or creating your own control incorporating the class. > [!NOTE] > 该 属性必须至少有一个要序列化的项。The property must have at least one entry to be serialized.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示字体是否带删除线。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the font is strikethrough.

value.span: 如果字体带删除线，则为 ；否则，为 。

span.span: if the font is struck through; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性来指定或确定字体是否包含一条文本。Use the property to specify or determine whether the font contains a line through the text. 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in view state. > [!NOTE] > 通过设置控件的的属性，对、和控件生成的链接的字体下划线行为进行了影响 。The font underline behavior for links generated by the , , and controls is affected by setting the property of the for the control. 如果 设置了属性，无论其值如何，都必须显式设置此 属性（如果想要对该链接进行下划线）。If the property is set, regardless of its value, you must set the property explicitly if you want the link to be underlined. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性以编程方式为控件指定删除线字体 。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically specify a strikethrough font for a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[FontInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FontInfo/CS/fontinfocs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FontInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FontInfo/VB/fontinfovb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性来指定或确定字体是否在文本下方包含一行。Use the property to specify or determine whether the font contains a line under the text. 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in view state. > [!NOTE] > 通过设置 控件的和 的属性，对、和控件生成的链接的字体下划线行为进行了影响 。The font underline behavior for links generated by the , , and controls is affected by setting the and the properties of the for the control. 如果 设置了或 属性，无论其值如何，都必须显式设置此 属性（如果想要对该链接进行下划线）。If the or the properties are set, regardless of their value, you must set the property explicitly if you want the link to be underlined. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性以编程方式为控件指定带下划线的字体 。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically specify an underlined font for a control.
